    6. Lattice Graphics

    7. Data Summaries: apply family of functions

      • Why apply?

    8. Intro to Statistical Models

      • Fitting a linear regression model
      • Model diagnostics

      • Why for loops?

      • Data and graphics examples

    10. Automation: writing functions
